body: The only time the warm side isn't better is in extremely warm climates. Needing to get out of bed for something and coming back to a nice, warm, comfy pillow is one of the best things on earth. I have never understood the cool side of the pillow thing. I'll flip my pillow to get a different corner or side for my head but then I've gotta wait for it to warm up again.
body_html: The only time the warm side isn't better is in extremely warm climates. I'll flip my pillow to get a different corner or side for my head but then I've gotta wait for it to warm up again.
title: The warm side of the pillow is superior in every way.

body: i am glad you qualified your statement. Come south and you definitely appreciate the cool side in summer,.
body_html: i am glad you qualified your statement. Come south and you definitely appreciate the cool side in summer,.

I'll flip my pillow to get a different corner or side for my head but then I've gotta wait for it to warm up again.
post.body_html: The only time the warm side isn't better is in extremely warm climates. Needing to get out of bed for something and coming back to a nice, warm, comfy pillow is one of the best things on earth. I have never understood the cool side of the pillow thing. I'll flip my pillow to get a different corner or side for my head but then I've gotta wait for it to warm up again.
post.title: The warm side of the pillow is superior in every way.

body: I could be wrong but it sounds like you're female. If so it's probably because you don't have our hormones constantly finding subtle ways to torment you, and one of those things is making heat unbearable.

body: I am female and we've got our own hormone related problems. I became easily overheated during my pregnancies and didn't want to touch anything above freezing, including pillows.

body: Yeah well that's how we feel 24/7 for the rest of our lives after turning like 10. But it doesn't matter because only female lives are valuable to nature and society, we only exist to slave away for them. If it weren't for the fact that I have too many close friends I'd probably off myself because my complete lack of tribal pride makes it all in vain, and according to the data I'm not the only one. So much male privilege.
